GSD.description:
wifi: brcmfmac: Fix potential buffer overflow in brcmf_fweh_event_worker()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.299 by commit b23665bbd39224e15aab89df4a4b60c0ab2ad09d. For more details please see the references link.
